com.penthera.virtuososdk.client

Interface IQueue.IQueuedAssetPermissionObserver

  • Enclosing interface:
    IQueue
    public static interface IQueue.IQueuedAssetPermissionObserver
    Result of permission check on adding Asset to queue.
    Normally, the download engine acquires any necessary download permissions when the item starts downloading. The permission check can be changed on the Backplane so the check occurs when the item is queued. This interface reports back on whether the queued Item was granted permission to be downloaded or not.
    See Also:
    IBackplaneSettings.getRequirePermissionWhenQueued()
      • Interacting with the Queue 
        Modifier and Type Method and Description
        onQueuedWithAssetPermission 
        abstract void onQueuedWithAssetPermission(boolean aQueued, boolean aDownloadPermitted, IAsset aAsset, int aAssetPermissionError)
        Callback to report on Asset's permission check when added to the queue.
        If the interface is provided to one of the Queue's Add methods then it will be called regardless of the RequirePermissionWhenQueued Setting.
        void onQueuedWithAssetPermission(boolean aQueued, boolean aDownloadPermitted, IAsset aAsset, int aAssetPermissionError)
        Callback to report on Asset's permission check when added to the queue.
        If the interface is provided to one of the Queue's Add methods then it will be called regardless of the RequirePermissionWhenQueued Setting.
        If an asset was not granted permission then the Asset will have its download status set to the relevant error. Additional details can be retrieved from the Asset; it holds the Backplane's permission response.
        Parameters:
        aQueued - True if asset was added to the queue.
        aDownloadPermitted - True if Asset was granted download permission. False otherwise.
        aAsset - The asset which was granted / denied download permission.
        aAssetPermissionError - one of the IAssetPermission.PermissionCode values
        See Also:
        IAsset.getLastPermissionResponse(), IAssetPermission, IAssetPermission.PermissionCode
